Feb 12, 2025: Yay, our work Max-Rank: Efficient Multiple Testing for Conformal Prediction on permutation-based multiple testing was accepted to AISTATS 2025! That means Thailand in May, who thought machine learning can take you to so many places. We switched up the paper name to better reflect our contributions, and give a simple solution to multiple testing issues.
